summary: This mod will make it so that you can buy longer lasting versions of the already existing spells.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will make it possible for you to buy longer lasting versions of many of the preexisting spells.  These spells last ten times longer allowing you more freedom since you don\'t have to recast them every 60 seconds.  They also require twice the magicka to be able to cast. You can buy them from the mages at the college of winterhold.  

Mod History

version 0.55
adds longer candlelight and magelight spells as well as longer versions of the flame, frost and lightning cloak spells.
version 0.54
adds longer versions of the master alteration spells (Dragonhide and Mass Paralysis).  
Version 0.53
Fixes bug that makes improved spells unavailable at lower skill levels
version 0.52
Fixes problem with muffle spell not lasting for as long as it should. 
(it should be 30 minutes not 12)
version 0.51
Fixes problem with some spells not costing the right amount
version 0.5 
Adds longer versions of almost all illusion and alteration spells


To install this mod just extract the .esp file from the RAR archive to you skyrim data directory.
author: TheBlackHandofSilence
